resources.string: If the orb you clicked is incorrect, please report it to help improve the image classification in future app updates.
To get started, take a picture of the board using the in-app camera. To get the most reliable results, zoom into the board and don\'t include the characters in the picture.
A list of all the possible moves will be displayed. If you click one of the possible moves, the swapped gems will be highlighted in pink.
If you hold down one of the possible moves, the next board and possible moves will be shown. The gems from skyfall are unknown and will be displayed with a question mark.

If you are having trouble getting the app to recognize the board, try turning off auto-crop in the settings. Crop the image close around the board (excluding the characters) for the most reliable results.

If the app incorrectly identifies one or more gems, you can report the mistake by pressing and holding the incorrect gem. This will help improve the gem classification in future updates and is greatly appreciated.
